emails.subject: HELP! We're trapped!
emails.content:
Uuuh, hello??!

What are you doing here? My name is Burt.. and uuuh.
I think I am stuck here, just like you it seems huh?

OH SHIT THE BREAK TIMER, IF THAT THING HITS 0 we are both screwed.

Help me!

Last time I checked I was in the store just being bored and I think I am trapped in one of these computers somehow.

Can you help me get out? And also yourself?

Luna left her computer running again. Look around there.

Better check it out…

Good luck, Burt.

emails.subject: The Vault
emails.content:
Hey… we are getting somewhere.

But you won't get any further, you will never crack the vault. Not even if you know my employee number.

Ash did some top notch security on that bad boi.

emails.subject: Arcade Machine Code
emails.content:
Woah, you got through the vault?

Well you won't get your way into the arcade machine.
Tom should have fixed it.

Hell I'll even give you the code for it.

It's 3333

emails.subject: The Obelisks
emails.content:
Ah, talked to Tom did you? He was stuck inside, ha! Just like you! Wait also me..

Listen, you go ahead and solve the "Obelisks", unlock it
With code 2222

But the guy Martin, who made that game. He got some of that big brain energy.

emails.subject: Movie Trivia Quiz
emails.content:
OK OK OK OK OK,

The other Tom was really into movie trivia, he made a quiz about it or something.

See if you can solve that then eh, if you are a movie buff, maybe we can get out.

Code is 8912

emails.subject: Another Quiz!
emails.content:
HMMM, DO ANOTHER MOVIE QUIZ
Should be next to the other one.

Code is 8742

emails.subject: Jurassic Park Game
emails.content:
I really like Jurassic Park, loved playing that game when I was here. Maybe I am stuck there?

There was a whole adventure game I think.

Find it and play it, then I will give you a hint.

You can unlock the game with code 9212

emails.subject: Security Camera
emails.content:
HA! You played the game, yay.

Tudududuuuduuuduuuh

Oh shit, I see the security camera is failing
Can you fix it?

You are almost out I promise.

Access Code is 1111

emails.subject: Mexican Standoff
emails.content:
Alright… I know where I am stuck.
I… ii am in the Mexican Standoff Arcade game..

Finish it, free me, and free yourself.

The code to start is 2222
